description: Retrieves the live connectivity status per device.

parameters.name: thingName
parameters.description: The name of your IoT thing.

nested_items.name: thingName
nested_items.description: The name of your IoT thing.

nested_items.name: connected
nested_items.description: A Boolean that indicates the connectivity status.

nested_items.name: timestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the event occurred.

nested_items.name: disconnectReason
nested_items.description: The reason why the client is disconnecting.
